title: Broken mir with variadic static function pointer

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust static mut foo: Option = None; fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` ustc 1.46.0-nightly (346aec9b0 2020-07-11) binary: rustc commit-hash: 346aec9b02f3c74f3fce97fd6bda24709d220e49 commit-date: 2020-07-11 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.46.0-nightly LLVM version: 10.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: bad_placeholder_type --> min-ice/src/main.rs:1:45 | 1 | static mut foo: Option = None; | ^ | = note: delayed at /rustc/346aec9b02f3c74f3fce97fd6bda24709d220e49/src/librustc_session/session.rs:436:27 error: internal compiler error: TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported | = note: delayed at /rustc/346aec9b02f3c74f3fce97fd6bda24709d220e49/src/librustc_session/session.rs:436:27 error: internal compiler error: cat_expr Errd --> min-ice/src/main.rs:1:56 | 1 | static mut foo: Option = None; | ^^^^ | = note: delayed at /rustc/346aec9b02f3c74f3fce97fd6bda24709d220e49/src/librustc_session/session.rs:436:27 error: internal compiler error: mir_const_qualif: MIR had errors --> min-ice/src/main.rs:1:1 | 1 | static mut foo: Option = None; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at /rustc/346aec9b02f3c74f3fce97fd6bda24709d220e49/src/librustc_session/session.rs:436:27 error: internal compiler error: PromoteTemps: MIR had errors --> min-ice/src/main.rs:1:1 | 1 | static mut foo: Option = None; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at /rustc/346aec9b02f3c74f3fce97fd6bda24709d220e49/src/librustc_session/session.rs:436:27 error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:3 ~ min_ice[2aeb]::foo[0]) ("return type"): bad type [type error] --> min-ice/src/main.rs:1:1 | 1 | static mut foo: Option = None; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at src/librustc_mir/borrow_check/type_check/mod.rs:258:27 error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:3 ~ min_ice[2aeb]::foo[0]) (LocalDecl { mutability: Mut, local_info: None, internal: false, is_block_tail: None, ty: [type error], user_ty: None, source_info: SourceInfo { span: min-ice/src/main.rs:1:1: 1:61 (#0), scope: scope[0] } }): bad type [type error] --> min-ice/src/main.rs:1:1 | 1 | static mut foo: Option = None; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at src/librustc_mir/borrow_check/type_check/mod.rs:258:27 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:367:17 stack backtrace: 0: backtrace::backtrace::libunwind::trace at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.46/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:86 1: backtrace::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.46/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66 2: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:78 3: ::fmt at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59 4: core::fmt::write at src/libcore/fmt/mod.rs:1076 5: std::io::Write::write_fmt at src/libstd/io/mod.rs:1537 6: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:62 7: std::sys_common::backtrace::print at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:49 8: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}} at src/libstd/panicking.rs:198 9: std::panicking::default_hook at src/libstd/panicking.rs:217 10: rustc_driver::report_ice 11: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook at src/libstd/panicking.rs:530 12: std::panicking::begin_panic 13: ::drop 14: core::ptr::drop_in_place 15: as core::ops::drop::Drop>::drop 16: core::ptr::drop_in_place 17: rustc_span::with_source_map 18: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 19: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
